sentences.en: A mother recognises the feel of her child's skin when blindfolded. Similarly, she can instantly identify her baby's cry.
sentences.cn: 即便是蒙上眼睛母亲也能摸出自己孩子的肌肤。同样地，母亲也能立即听出自己孩子的哭声。

sentences.en: He was late and I similarly was delayed.
Husband and wife were similarly successful in their chosen careers.
sentences.cn: 夫妇俩在各自所选择的事业上都很成功。

sentences.en: Most of the men who now gathered round him again were similarly dressed.
sentences.cn: 现在再次聚集到他周围的人穿戴大都差不多。

sentences.en: Other people have been similarly buried in worse prisons, before now.
sentences.cn: 以前别人不也同样在更恶劣的监狱里被埋葬过么? ”

sentences.en: Plants must be covered with a leaf-mould or similarly protected if frost threatens.
sentences.cn: 如果霜冻来临，植物必须盖上腐叶土或用类似方法加以保护。

sentences.en: Similarly, any pigment nevus that is chronically irritated should be excised.
sentences.cn: 同样, 凡是经常受慢性刺激的各种色素痣切勿予以切除.

sentences.en: Similarly, programmers apply self - referential design when they create implementation - model products.
sentences.cn: 同样, 当程序员创建基于实现模型的产品时,应用的是自参考设计.

sentences.en: Similarly, the Republic's legislative practices came from the parent land.
sentences.cn: 同样, 共和国的分歧程序也仿效母国.

sentences.en: Similarly, the status of user interface objects should be apparent to users.
sentences.cn: 类似地, 用户界面对象的状态也应该对用户是显而易见的.

sentences.en: Similarly, we feel comfortable with people with physical qualities similar to ours.
sentences.cn: 同样, 对于那些身体素质与我们相似的人也颇具好感.

sentences.en: The cost of food and clothing has come down in recent years. Similarly, fuel prices have fallen quite considerably.
sentences.cn: 吃穿的费用近年来下降了。 同样地，燃料价格也有大幅 回落。

sentences.en: The first letter she wrote me was less than a page long, and her second letter was similarly brief.
sentences.cn: 她写给我的第一封信不到一页，第二封信也一样简短。

sentences.en: The great concourse of people seemed to have been similarly impressed.
sentences.cn: 这一大群人似乎也留下了同样深刻的印象。

sentences.en: The prize for media winners has been similarly impressive.
sentences.cn: 至于那些获胜的传播媒介,所得到的奖励也同样是很可观的.

sentences.en: Whatever lucky star Margaret was born under, Mark was not similarly blessed.
sentences.cn: 不论玛格丽特多走运, 马克也得不到上帝同样的恩赐.
